mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study(studyNum, studyName, studyIntro, userId, studyLocation, studySday, studyEday, studyImg, headcount) VALUES(#{studyNum}, #{studyName}, #{studyIntro}, #{userId}, #{studyLocation}, #{studySday}, #{studyEday}, #{studyImg}, #{headcount})
INSERT INTO applyStudy(studyNum, userId, goal, hope) VALUES(#{studyNum}, #{userId}, #{goal}, #{hope})
mapper.select:
SELECT s.studyNum, studyName, studyIntro, userId, studyLocation, studySday, studyEday, studyImg, headcount, categoryName, color FROM study AS s LEFT OUTER JOIN studyCourseList AS l ON l.studyNum = s.studyNum left outer join course AS c ON l.courseNum = c.courseNum left outer join category AS ca ON c.categoryNum = ca.categoryNum
ORDER BY studyNum DESC limit #{start}, #{rows}

SELECT IFNULL(count(*), 0) FROM study as s left outer join studyCourseList as l on l.studyNum = s.studyNum left outer join course as c on l.courseNum = c.courseNum left outer join category as ca on c.categoryNum = ca.categoryNum

SELECT s.studyNum, studyName, studyIntro, s.userId, nickname, studyLocation, DATE_FORMAT(studySday, '%Y-%m-%d') AS studySday, DATE_FORMAT(studyEday, '%Y-%m-%d') AS studyEday, studyImg, headcount FROM study as s left outer join studyCourseList as l on l.studyNum = s.studyNum left outer join course as c on l.courseNum = c.courseNum left outer join category as ca on c.categoryNum = ca.categoryNum left outer join memberInfo as m on s.userId = m.userId where s.studyNum = #{studyNum}

SELECT s.studyNum, c.courseName FROM study as s left outer join studyCourseList as l on l.studyNum = s.studyNum left outer join course as c on l.courseNum = c.courseNum WHERE s.studyNum = #{studyNum};
SELECT courseNum, categoryNum, courseName FROM course WHERE categoryNum=#{categoryNum}
